description: Connect up to 10 USB 3.0, 2.0, or 1.1 devices to a single port on any USB 2.0 or 3.0 capable computer. Additional charging port (2.1A) offers enough current to charge either a smartphone or a tablet at high speed. USB 3.0 ports supply 0.9A each.DesignDesigned with a built-in surge protector to keep your devices safe. Supports hot swapping.PerformanceEasily add 10 USB 3.0 SuperSpeed ports to your PC and enjoy data transfer rates of up to 5Gbps for faster sync times.Power12V 4A Power Adapter and Build-in Surge Protector will provide a super strong power for each USB portCompatibilityColor: Black. Supports: Windows XP/Vista/7/8& Mac systems .Plug and play; no driver required ON / OFF switches activate or deactivate individual portsNote:2.4Ghz wireless devices (keyboards, mice, etc.) may not work around USB 3.0 ports. Try using a USB 2.0 connection.Package Content:* USB 3.0 10-port Hub* 1x 3.3Ft. USB3.0 Cable* AC power adapter* User manual* User experience card
title: iDsonix® USB 3.0 10 Port Hub + 5V 2.1A Smart Charging Port + 3 On/Off Switch with 12V 4A Power Adapter Build-in Surge Protector [VIA VL812 Chipset]
